message: Bob, I believe this product is incredibly valuable, and I'm pleased to offer it to you first.  Given its potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,300,000.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations and deliver substantial returns.
Thank you for considering my request, Alice. While I appreciate the value you see in this product, I believe we can reach a more mutually beneficial agreement. My counteroffer is $1,200,000.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer and your understanding of the inherent value of this product. To find a middle ground, I'm proposing $1,275,000. I believe this price reflects the unique benefits and potential it holds for your specific needs.
Alice, thank you for your proposal. I understand the value of the product, but I believe we can come to an even better agreement. My counteroffer is $1,250,000.
